title: Constant 120+ms delay going on for 5 straight days now
body: Constant 120+ ms delay going of for a few days now, its unbearable and I am unable to play LoL because of it. Before that my ping was around 40-60. Now I cant play anymore because of this unbearable delay I am having, Riot Support is down so I cannot complain there. Please can you provide a solution to stop this suffering.

replies.body: Delete this fking game go play HOTS or Dota. EUNE IS PIECE OF SHIT!!!

A consistently high ping like what you mention can be a result of a change in your network, or even how your ISP is routing to our game servers.  If you're currently able to access it, check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  I haven't had any issues visiting it, so I hope that helps!
